name: DARLING DASH LIMITED
description:
Whether it’s an app for couples to share privately, a new way to swap details with a contact or an icebreaker for expats to explore. We constantly strive to build new products that connect-people-better in creative and innovative ways.
In the past we have worked successfully with a range of commercial clients from premier league sports brands to the worlds biggest pharmacutical company; delivering traditional solutions in the user experience, product design and campaign space.
